RICHLAND, Wash., Jan.  10, 2024  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Energy Northwest today announced an agreement with Bellevue-based Puget Sound Energy to accelerate the agencys program examining the feasibility of developing and deploying a next-generation nuclear energy facility.
